dt: {bc}the action or state of one that rides

shortdef: the action or state of one that rides

dt: {bc}one of the three administrative jurisdictions into which Yorkshire, England, was formerly divided
{bc}an administrative jurisdiction or electoral district in a British dominion (such as Canada)

et: Middle English {it}-redying{/it} or {it}trithing{/it}, alteration of Old English {it}*thriding{/it}, from Old Norse {it}thrithjungr{/it} third part, from {it}thrithi{/it} third; akin to Old English {it}thridda{/it} third {ma}{mat|third:1|}{/ma}

an administrative jurisdiction or electoral district in a British dominion (such as Canada)
